text: ya 'ayuha aladhin saddaqu allah warasulah waeamiluu bshreh, adhkuruu allah bqlwbkm walsntkm wjwarhkm dhikrana kthyrana, washghlu awqatkm bidhikr allah taealaa eind alsabah walmsa', wa'adbar alsalawat almfrwdat, waeind aleward walasbab, fa'iina dhlk eibadat mshrwet, tadeu 'iilaa mahabatan allh, wakafa allisan ean alatham, wteyn ealaa kl khyr
